downloadDescription: Microsoft Entra Connect allows you to quickly onboard to Entra ID and Office 365
detailsSection:
You can also download the latest version from the Microsoft Entra Admin Center under Manage. We will soon stop publishing new download files here and only publish in the Microsoft Entra Admin Center.

Integrating your on-premises directories with Entra ID makes your users more productive by providing a common identity for accessing both cloud and on-premises resources. With this integration users and organizations can take advantage of the following :
  • Organizations can provide users with a common hybrid identity across on-premises or cloud-based services leveraging Windows Server Active Directory and then connecting to Entra ID.
  • Administrators can provide conditional access based on application resource, device and user identity, network location and multifactor authentication.
  • Users can leverage their common identity through accounts in Entra ID to Office 365, Intune, SaaS apps and third-party applications.
  • Developers can build applications that leverage the common identity model, integrating applications into Active Directory on-premises or Azure for cloud-based applications
Microsoft Entra Connect makes this integration easy and simplifies the management of your on-premises and cloud identity infrastructure. To find information about the Microsoft Entra Connect version release history, please refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/hybrid/reference-connect-version-history.
systemRequirementsSection: For more information about Microsoft Entra Connect, please refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/hybrid/how-to-connect-install-prerequisites.
installInstructionSection: To learn how to install Microsoft Entra Connect, please refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/hybrid/how-to-connect-install-roadmap#install-azure-ad-connect.
